name: DebatsMethodiques
description: To get a better way to debate
author: Birdy

scripts.dev: watchify -t pugify 'src/main.js' -o 'bin/debatmethodique.js' -v --debug & budo src/main.js:./bin/debatmethodique.js --live -- -t pugify 'src/main.js' -o 'bin/debatmethodique.js' -v --debug & sass --watch src/css/style.scss:src/css/style.css
scripts.css: npx tailwind build src/css/style.css -o bin/debatmethodique.css -c tailwind.config.js
